Class CategoryServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salimov.yurii.service.data.impl.DataServiceImpl<T,E>
      • com.salimov.yurii.service.data.impl.ContentServiceImpl<Category,java.lang.Long>
        • com.salimov.yurii.service.data.impl.CategoryServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CategoryService, ContentService<Category,java.lang.Long>, DataService<Category,java.lang.Long>

    @Service
 @ComponentScan(basePackages={"com.salimov.yurii.dao","com.salimov.yurii.service.data"})
public final class CategoryServiceImpl
extends ContentServiceImpl<Category,java.lang.Long>
implements CategoryService
    The class of the service layer, implements a set of methods for working with objects of the class Category.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yurii Salimov (yuriy.alex.salimov@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    Category, CategoryService, ContentServiceImpl, DataServiceImpl, CategoryDao
